articles.author: Caitlin O'Kane
articles.title: Wendy Williams diagnosed with primary progressive aphasia and frontotemporal dementia - CBS News
articles.description: Wendy Williams' team revealed she has been diagnosed with primary progressive aphasia​ and frontotemporal dementia​.
articles.content: Wendy Williams has been diagnosed with primary progressive aphasia and frontotemporal dementia. Williams had taken a leave from her talk show in 2021 while she dealt with health issues, and in 2023, … [+4318 chars]
